DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this pilot-study is to investigate the effect of Vildagliptin in comparison to glimepiride on beta cell function and the cardiovascular risk profile in patients previously treated with Metformin monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Adding Vildagliptin on Beta Cell Function and Cardiovascular Risk Markers in Patients With Moderate Metabolic Control During Metformin Monotherapy
